outputs.output_descr: Seeks to develop a range of coping mechanisms for reducing vulnerability of small-holder farmers and pastoralists to long-term climate change, including variability  this will be done by developing capacity of national and local level stakeholders

project_descr: 4KEN09401:  Kenya:CC(SCCF)-PIMS 3792 "Adapting to CC in ASALs"Kenya Adaptation to Climate Change in Arid and Semi-arid Lands project .
project_title: 4KEN09401: Kenya:CC(SCCF) - Adapting to CC in ASALs
